name: Winter's Call
description:
Winter's Call is an in development explorable environment set within the snowy alps in Europe in the Mesolithic era. The scene has been created using appropriate information from the Mesolithic era and how the hunter/gathers lived to make the scene as real as possible to the player. I would appreciate any feedback for each prototype released so that I can improve the current scene as much as possible. 

As of yet, I have come across an issue which I have yet to fix which is that the item description (the text which is supposed to be on the stone plaque once you interact with the in-scene items) does not show up for some reason and I don't know why. It works perfectly fine in my the editor while I was creating my project and the packaging had no issues as well. If anyone knows a solution, it would be highly appreciated.
